publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1093 Maureen Macmillan: New Scandinavia/Inverness Air Service-That the Parliament welcomes the new Inverness/Stockholm air service to be run by the Scandinavian airline Snowflake which commences on 29 March 2004; congratulates the staff at Highlands and Islands Airports Ltd on their hard work to negotiate the introduction of this new service using Scottish Executive route development funding; notes that this new service will be an asset to both business and holiday travellers in the Highlands and Sweden, and hopes that this will be the first of many new regular air links between Scandinavia and the Highlands of Scotland.

S2M-1093 New Scandinavia/Inverness Air Service (lodged on 24 March 2004) Pauline McNeill*, Jackie Baillie*, Mary Scanlon*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Helen Eadie*, Fergus Ewing*, Ms Sandra White*, Mike Watson*, Trish Godman*, Christine May*, George Lyon*

S2M-1093 Maureen Macmillan: New Scandinavia/Inverness Air Service-That the Parliament welcomes the new Inverness/Stockholm air service to be run by the Scandinavian airline Snowflake which commences on 29 March 2004; congratulates the staff at Highlands and Islands Airports Ltd on their hard work to negotiate the introduction of this new service using Scottish Executive route development funding; notes that this new service will be an asset to both business and holiday travellers in the Highlands and Sweden, and hopes that this will be the first of many new regular air links between Scandinavia and the Highlands of Scotland. Supported by: Pauline McNeill, Jackie Baillie, Mary Scanlon, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Roseanna Cunningham, Helen Eadie, Fergus Ewing, Ms Sandra White, Mike Watson, Trish Godman, Christine May, George Lyon
S2M-1093 New Scandinavia/Inverness Air Service (lodged on 24 March 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1093 New Scandinavia/Inverness Air Service (lodged on 24 March 2004) Scott Barrie*, Karen Whitefield*
S2M-1093 New Scandinavia/Inverness Air Service (lodged on 24 March 2004) Phil Gallie*, Dr Jean Turner*, Alex Neil*
S2M-1093 New Scandinavia/Inverness Air Service (lodged on 24 March 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*
